trait.name: Fiery Aura
entries: A creature that enters the area or begins its turn within 5 feet of the blazing skeleton takes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) fire damage.

action.name: Fiery Touch
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4}) fire damage.

action.name: Explosive Ember
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 6} to hit, range 120 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) fire damage, and creatures within 5 feet of the target take 3 ({@damage 1d6}) fire damage.
